item.description:
Welcome to the "Abundance and Empowerment" Meetup!

From 6:00 to 7:00, we'll meet, mingle, order food and drinks and introduce ourselves. This is a good time to consider sharing our stories, or the name of a book, CD or movie that sparked our interest in using positive, nurturing thought patterns to improve our lives.

From 7:00 to 8:00 we'll take another look at "Ordering From The Cosmic Kitchen - The Essential Guide to Powerful, Nourishing Affirmations.

This will be our fourth meeting and we've found that when you put a group of positive thinkig, like-minded people together we make friends and bond very easily.


Hope to see you my friends from our previous three Meetups, and meet the new people who have RSVPed!

Laurie

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Abundance and Empowerment Meetup
